<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Staggering Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=3616) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 81

**Archetype** [Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=47)

**Prerequisites**
[Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1885)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

</column>

---

You've learned how to fire at enemies to slow them down, allowing innocents and fellow knights alike time to escape. Make a ranged Strike with a weapon in the [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3) weapon group. On a hit, the target takes a –5-foot circumstance penalty to its Speed until the end of its turn, or a –10-foot circumstance penalty on a critical hit.
